name: JavaScript
description: JavaScript is a versatile programming language used to create dynamic and interactive web content. It is widely adopted for frontend and backend development, enabling powerful web applications.

name: React
description: React is a powerful JavaScript library for building interactive user interfaces. With its component-based architecture, it allows for efficient development and seamless UI updates.

name: MongoDB
description: MongoDB is a NoSQL database that offers flexibility and scalability. It stores data in a JSON-like format, making it easy to work with and ideal for handling large volumes of data.

name: Node.js
description: Node.js is a powerful runtime environment that allows developers to run JavaScript on the server side. It provides a non-blocking I/O model, making it efficient for building scalable applications.
